title: Silver Rises Toward Record as ETF Investors Add Fuel to Rally
description: Silver traded near an all-time high, reinforced by the strongest week since July for inflows to exchange-traded funds backed by the precious metal. Gold was steady.
content: Silver traded near an all-time high, reinforced by the strongest week since July for inflows to exchange-traded funds backed by the precious metal. Gold was steady.
